nodes.text: Spaceworld was a source of entertainment on the planet Coruscant. Posters were put up around the city in order to promote it. The posters showed an evil face with a large grin, with the name "Spaceworld" painted in red Aurebesh letters.

The poster is first seen from far away in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode Lightsaber Lost, inside the building where Anakin Skywalker goes to fetch the criminal Car Affa. In this episode, the Aurebesh caption is unreadable. The poster is seen in close-up in Moshi Bar in Lethal Trackdown, and again in an unidentified cantina in Pursuit of Peace.
